constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: ART4 Name: Kingston Hill and Park Road

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Conditions conditions 18 (verification report) and 19 (contamination) of permission 18/12924/FUL  are hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by conditions 18 (verification report) and 19 (contamination) of permission 18/12924/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings and erection of part 3 part 4 storey mixed use building to provide commercial use on part of the ground floor with flexible B1(a) office use and D1 health centre/surgery use, erection of no. 6 flats on the ground and upper floors together with the provision of associated amenity space, refuse and cycle storage facilities and car parking (amended details submitted))
